titles: An elegy on that illustrious and high-born Prince Rupert, who dyed on Wednesday November the 29th.
author: A person of quality.
notes: Signed: Written by a person of quallity.
Verse: "Farewell, thou bravest of the great, farewell ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Rupert, --  Prince, Count Palatine, 1619-1682 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
